/*

/* Change Log
v1.5
02/21/2019 - Text color updates for readability.
02/04/2019 - Privacy Policy page color update for readability.
11/20/2018 - OKC appears to be doing an overhaul of how the profiles function. Modal added.
v1.4
11/05/2018 - Settings color revision. Edited report message text color.
10/31/2018 - Lightbox edits.
10/01/2018 - Updated user cards to reflect new CSS.
v1.3
Changed color of initial message sent by person
v1.2
Made sidebar profile text pink, again.
Profile text background changed to black.
Added pink hover over Browse Match photos.
v1.1
* Updated moderator guideline colors.
*/
